item.description:
*SAT NOV 6 - One Flew Over The Cuckoos Nest with The CT Theatre Group
SATURDAY November 6 at 8 pm

Join us for dinner before the show at:

Ruby Tuesday of Cromwell
50 SHUNPIKE ROAD
CROMWELL CT 06416
860-635-9970

In KMart / Rookies Plaza

860-635-9970

Enjoy a great night of Friends and Theatre - at a discounted price!

One Flew over The Cuckoo’s Nest
By Dale Wasserman


Based on the novel by Ken Kesey, the story of one man who fights back, asserting his individuality in the face of a repressive, conformist system remains a powerful theatrical statement

Tickets are $38

*** Get your Advance Tickets at the 20% CT Theatre Group Discount - Only $31.50 ***

We have a very limited number of Discount tickets available – get yours before we run out!

Pick Up Your Tickets the Will Call Window

The CT Theatre Group has a very limited number of discounted tickets

THIS SHOW WILL SELL OUT Reserve your seat while tickets remain

Ivoryton Playhouse
103 Main Street
Ivoryton, CT 06442

The Ivoryton Playhouse is located 15 minutes away from Middletown next to Essex CT


Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket at the will call window
